summary: Metal Gear is a popular video game series created by Hideo Kojima. The games are about secret agents, like Solid Snake, who must find and stop a powerful weapon called Metal Gear. It started in 1987 and has since released many titles on different consoles. The games are known for their sneaking gameplay, exciting stories, and movie-like scenes. They've won awards and sold over 61 million copies. The character Solid Snake is so famous he even appears in other games like *Super Smash Bros.*
title: Metal Gear
